author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Slaskie Kamienice To Vote On Transfer Of Its Shares' Trading To Main Market Of WSE
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - SLASKIE KAMIENICE SA:
* SAID ON FRIDAY THAT ITS SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE ON MARCH 26 ON TRANSFER OF TRADING OF THE COMPANYâ€˜S SHARES TO MAIN MARKET OF WARSAW STOCK EXCHANGE
* SHAREHOLDERS ALSO TO VOTE ON AUTHORIZATION OF MANAGEMENT TO BUY BACK UP TO 2,083,892 OWN SHARES FOR MAXIMUM AMOUNT OF 2.1 MILLION ZLOTYS
* PURCHASE PRICE FOR OWN SHARES CANNOT BE HIGHER THAN 12 ZLOTYS PER SHARE AND CANNOT BE LOWER THAN 0.10 ZLOTYS PER SHARE
